song.englishname: J Train: Linney Brothers + DJ Maj Remix

english.segment1: I got a ticket, I got a ticket. I got a ticket to ride. (I gotta a ticket to ride to the other side). I got a ticket, I got a ticket. I got a ticket to ride
english.segment2: Ride, ride wanna ride on the J-Train. On the J-Train, wanna ride on the J-Train. Ride, ride wanna ride on the J-Train. On the J-Train, wanna ride on the J-Train
english.segment3: Sit back, relax put on your travelin' gear. No need to doubt so put aside your fear. Destination, out of this atmosphere. It's the J-Train baby, we depart from right here
english.segment4: No lines to fight no ticket to price. I'm rollin' first class 'cause I've seen the light. Try as you may but your money can't buy. A ticket on the J-Line to the other side
english.segment5: I got a ticket, I got a ticket. I got a ticket to ride. I got a ticket, I got a ticket. I got a ticket to ride. (I gotta a ticket to ride to the other side)
english.segment6: Ride, ride wanna ride on the J-Train. On the J-Train, wanna ride on the J-Train. Ride, ride wanna ride on the J-Train. On the J-Train, wanna ride on the J-Train
english.segment7: Now I missed the Train more than once in my life. Til' the good conductor heard my Momma's cry. Hades to Glory in the blink of an eye. Hear me now, hear me now while I testify
english.segment8: Heard the whistle blow I felt a chill to the bone. All aboard is what I heard it I was headed for home. Had a reclinable seat but I just had to stand. Up on the, "J" all the way to the promise land
english.segment9: I got a ticket, I got a ticket. I got a ticket to ride. I got a ticket, I got a ticket. I got a ticket to ride. (I gotta a ticket to ride to the other side)
english.segment10: Ride, ride wanna ride on the J-Train. On the J-Train, wanna ride on the J-Train. Ride, ride wanna ride on the J-Train. On the J-Train, wanna ride on the J-Train
english.segment11: Do you wanna ride say. To the other side say. If you wanna ride say. Get on the freak-line
english.segment12: I got a ticket, I got a ticket. I got a ticket to ride. I got a, I got a. I got a, I got a. I got a, I got a
